Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
com.example.c482software1project.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
controller sets up logic and controls for the modify product page.
Author:
Anthony Collins.

      method used to give the search bar logic to search parts by Name and ID.

    • setLoadProduct

      public static void setLoadProduct(Product loadProduct)
      method used to set the loadProduct instance of product we declared earlier to be a copy of the product that was selected to be modified.

    • addButtonClicked

      public void addButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      declares method called on when the add button is clicked it will take the selected part ask the user if they are sure they want to add it to the products associated parts with an alert. if the user clicks confirm the part is added to the associated parts list.

    • removeButtonClicked

      public void removeButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      declares method to remove button when clicked the user will be asked if they are sure they wish to remove the associated part from the product.

    • SaveButtonClicked

      public void SaveButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      method for logic when the save button is clicked for saving a product.
      Parameters:
      event - is the save button being clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - simple IOException.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      initialization method loads controller and populates fields with the part that was selected.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:

      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
